output: html_document

#' ## Git Operations Workflow
#' Demonstrate checking Git status, staging, committing, and pushing files using gert.

# Install and load gert
install.packages("gert")
library(gert)

# Check Git status
git_status()

# Stage all new/modified files
git_add(".")

# Commit changes
git_commit("Resolve merge conflicts")  # only if conflicts existed
git_commit("Add initial project files") # Commit changes

# Push to GitHub
git_push() # normal push
git_push(force = TRUE) # force push if needed

# Convert R script to R Markdown
knitr::spin("your_script.R", knit = FALSE)  # creates your_script.Rmd
